Parameters.Name: GetServices_MediaServiceFetures
Parameters.Description: Only GetCapabilities Supported Media Service Video JPEG H.264 MPEG4 Audio G.711 G.726 AAC Real-time Streaming RTP/UDP RTP/RTSP/HTTP RTP/RTSP/TCP RTP-Multicast/UDP Snapshot URI

Test.Name: [GetServices] Media Service: Real-time Streaming features 1
Test.Description: GetServices - SUPPORTED GetCapabilities - NOT SUPPORTED Media Service - SUPPORTED Real-time Streaming - SUPPORTED (flag skipped) GetDevice Information is used for Authentication type detection.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetServices - SUPPORTED GetCapabilities - NOT SUPPORTED
Media Service - SUPPORTED
Real-time Streaming - SUPPORTED RTP/UDP - SUPPORTED RTP/RTSP/HTTP - SUPPORTED RTP/RTSP/TCP - SUPPORTED RTP-Multicast/UDP - SUPPORTED Snapshot URI - SUPPORTED
Video - GROUP JPEG - SUPPORTED MPEG4 - SUPPORTED H.264 - SUPPORTED
Audio - SUPPORTED G.711 - SUPPORTED G.726 - SUPPORTED AAC - SUPPORTED
Audio Output - NOT SUPPORTED G.711 - NOT SUPPORTED G.726 - NOT SUPPORTED AAC - NOT SUPPORTED

Test.Name: [GetServices] Media Service: Real-time Streaming features 2
Test.Description: GetServices - SUPPORTED GetCapabilities - NOT SUPPORTED Media Service - SUPPORTED Real-time Streaming - SUPPORTED (flag skipped) GetDevice Information is used for Authentication type detection.

ExpectedResult.TestSummary:
GetServices - SUPPORTED GetCapabilities - NOT SUPPORTED
Media Service - SUPPORTED
Real-time Streaming - SUPPORTED RTP/UDP - SUPPORTED RTP/RTSP/HTTP - SUPPORTED RTP/RTSP/TCP - NOT SUPPORTED RTP-Multicast/UDP - NOT SUPPORTED Snapshot URI - NOT SUPPORTED
Video - GROUP JPEG - SUPPORTED MPEG4 - SUPPORTED H.264 - SUPPORTED
Audio - SUPPORTED G.711 - SUPPORTED G.726 - SUPPORTED AAC - SUPPORTED
Audio Output - NOT SUPPORTED G.711 - NOT SUPPORTED G.726 - NOT SUPPORTED AAC - NOT SUPPORTED

Test.Name: [GetServices] Media Service: Real-time Streaming features 3
